ing.item: Cut-up cooked beef; (I use the packaged cubed stew beef) (up to 3)
(10 oz each) frozen hash brown potatoes; thawed

directions.step:
(Rival Crock-Pot Cooking)
Place all ingredients in Crock-Pot. Cover and cook on Low setting for 6 to 8 hours (on High setting for 2 to 3 hours).
4 servings (about 1 1/2 quarts). Double recipe for 5-quart Crockpot
Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by vergie1@juno.com (Vergie A Ewing) on Dec 26, 1997
